title: Horizontal Asymptote
text: To find the horizontal asymptote, determine where the $$y$$ value approaches as the $$x$$ value goes to infinity or negative infinity

title: Horizontal Asymptote to Infinity
text: As $$x$$ apporaches $$\infty$$, $$2^{\left(-x\right)}$$ approaches $$0$$. Therefore, the horizontal asymptote is $$y=1-0=1$$.
